mapper.select: SELECT reviewNum, reviewAuthor, reviewContents, reviewDate, reviewParentsNum, reviewLikeCnt, reviewStar, i.itemNum as itemNum, i.goods as goods, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachNum) AS reviewAttachNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachName) AS reviewAttachNames, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachParentsNum) AS reviewAttachParentsNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileSize) AS reviewfileSizes, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileContentType) AS reviewContentTypes FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewAttach a ON r.reviewNum=a.reviewAttachParentsNum LEFT OUTER JOIN item i ON r.reviewParentsNum = i.itemNum GROUP BY r.reviewNum ORDER BY r.reviewNum DESC

SELECT reviewNum, reviewAuthor, reviewContents, reviewDate, reviewParentsNum, reviewLikeCnt, reviewStar, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachNum) AS reviewAttachNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachName) AS reviewAttachNames, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachParentsNum) AS reviewAttachParentsNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileSize) AS reviewfileSizes, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileContentType) AS reviewContentTypes FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewAttach a ON r.reviewNum=a.reviewAttachParentsNum WHERE reviewParentsNum=#{itemNum} GROUP BY r.reviewNum ORDER BY r.reviewNum DESC

SELECT reviewNum, reviewAuthor, reviewContents, reviewDate, reviewParentsNum, reviewLikeCnt, reviewStar, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachNum) AS reviewAttachNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachName) AS reviewAttachNames, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachParentsNum) AS reviewAttachParentsNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileSize) AS reviewfileSizes, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileContentType) AS reviewContentTypes FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewAttach a ON r.reviewNum=a.reviewAttachParentsNum WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reviewContents=#{reviewContents} WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
UPDATE review SET reviewLikeCnt=reviewLikeCnt+1 WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
mapper.select: SELECT reviewNum, reviewAuthor, reviewContents, reviewDate, reviewParentsNum, reviewLikeCnt, reviewStar, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachNum) AS reviewAttachNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachName) AS reviewAttachNames, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachParentsNum) AS reviewAttachParentsNums, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileSize) AS reviewfileSizes, GROUP_CONCAT(reviewAttachFileContentType) AS reviewContentTypes FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewAttach a ON r.reviewNum = a.reviewAttachParentsNum GROUP BY r.reviewNum ORDER BY reviewLikeCnt DESC LIMIT 3
